SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: SELECT t.`ID` AS tID,t.`Name`,t.`TypeDescribe` FROM TB_MB_ArticleType AS t WHERE t.`Status`=TRUE ORDER BY t.`TypeSort`;

SELECT a.`ID` AS aID,a.`ArticleTitle`,a.`ArticleContent`,a.`ImageUrl`,a.`BitImageUrl`,a.`ArticleSource` ,a.`ArticleSourceUrl`,a.`PublishDate`,UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.`PublishDate`) AS PublishDateTicks,a.`PraiseCount`,a.`CommentCount`,a.ReadCount,a.`CreationDate`,UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.`CreationDate`) AS CreationDateTicks,a.WeChatUrl ,(SELECT COUNT(0) FROM TB_MC_Collection AS c WHERE c.`Source_ID`=a.ID AND c.`Status`=TRUE AND c.`Source_Type`=2 LIMIT 0,1) AS CollectionCount <%= ,(SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `TB_MB_Comment` c WHERE c.`Source_ID`=a.ID AND c.`Source_Type`=3 AND c.`Comment_Type`=2 AND c.`Status`=TRUE AND c.`Comment_User_ID`=@@User_ID@@) AS MyPraiseCount %> FROM TB_MB_Article AS a WHERE a.`Status`=TRUE <%= AND a.`ArticleType_ID`=@@ArticleType_ID@@ %> ORDER BY a.`ArticleSort`;

<%= UPDATE TB_MB_Article SET ReadCount=ReadCount+1 WHERE `ID`=@@Article_ID@@; %> SELECT a.`ID` AS aID,a.`ArticleTitle`,a.`ArticleContent`,a.`ImageUrl`,a.`BitImageUrl`,a.`ArticleSource` ,a.`ArticleSourceUrl`,a.`PublishDate`,UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.`PublishDate`) AS PublishDateTicks,a.`PraiseCount`,a.`CommentCount`,a.ReadCount,a.`CreationDate`,UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.`CreationDate`) AS CreationDateTicks,a.WeChatUrl ,(SELECT COUNT(0) FROM TB_MC_Collection AS c WHERE c.`Source_ID`=a.ID AND c.`Status`=TRUE AND c.`Source_Type`=2 LIMIT 0,1) AS CollectionCount <%= ,(SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `TB_MB_Comment` c WHERE c.`Source_ID`=a.ID AND c.`Source_Type`=3 AND c.`Comment_Type`=2 AND c.`Status`=TRUE AND c.`Comment_User_ID`=@@User_ID@@) AS MyPraiseCount %> <%= ,(SELECT COUNT(0) FROM TB_MC_Collection AS c WHERE c.User_ID=@@User_ID@@ and c.`Source_ID`=@@Article_ID@@ AND c.`Status`=TRUE AND c.`Source_Type`=2 LIMIT 0,1) AS IsCollection %> FROM TB_MB_Article AS a WHERE a.`Status`=TRUE <%= AND a.`ID`=@@Article_ID@@ %> LIMIT 0,1;
